snippet: The prospect of a period of deep ethnic tension is dampening the celebrations over the retaking of the city by French and Malian soldiers from the Islamist militants.
abstract: Prospect of period of deep ethnic tension in Mali is dampening celebrations over retaking of Timbuktu by French and Malian soldiers from Islamist militants.

byline.contributor: Steven Erlanger contributed reporting from Munich, Eric Schmitt from Washington and Scott Sayare from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The prospect of a period of deep ethnic tension is dampening the celebrations over the retaking of the city by French and Malian soldiers from the Islamist militants.

headline.seo: Ethnic Tensions Arise in Timbuktu After Islamists Leave
headline.main: Islamists’ Harsh Rule Awakened Ethnic Tensions in Timbuktu
headline.print_headline: Islamists’ Harsh Rule Awakened Ethnic Tensions in Timbuktu
